name: Manifold Modifications
summary: You've modified your innovation using clever workarounds, so you can include another initial modification without compromising its structure.
description:
You've modified your innovation using clever workarounds, so you can include another initial modification without compromising its structure. Your innovation gains an additional initial modification from the list for innovations of its type.Traits

Modification: A feat with this trait alters the construction of your innovation. If you have the reconfigure class feature, you can retrain such a feat more easily
